description.value: At 13th level, a medium can send his consciousness to the Astral Plane any number of times per day to ask the spirits for advice, as if using @Compendium[pf1.spells.68ngvzmzvadhf6vs]{Contact Other Plane} to contact the Astral Plane. The medium automatically succeeds at the Intelligence check to avoid the possible decrease to his Intelligence and Charisma.
